summary: This document is an email chain regarding scheduling a meeting about Jeffrey Epstein. The emails discuss finding a time for a meeting involving 'all brass' to discuss Epstein, requested by someone named Geoff.

persons.name: Geoff
persons.context: The individual who requested a meeting on Epstein with 'all brass' to be scheduled.

events.title: Scheduling of Epstein meeting
events.description: Email exchange to schedule a meeting about Jeffrey Epstein involving 'all brass'.

keyFacts: On January 6, 2020, emails were exchanged to schedule a meeting about Jeffrey Epstein.
The meeting was requested by someone named Geoff and was to involve 'all brass'.
The scheduling discussion aimed for a time before 3 PM on an upcoming Thursday.
